app.name: MeetingLingo
features.title: Features that make language barriers disappear
features.subtitle: MeetingLingo combines cutting-edge AI with intuitive design to create a seamless translation experience.
features.languages.desc: Support for over 50 languages including English, Spanish, Chinese, French, German, Japanese, and more.
features.realtime.desc: Instant voice translation with minimal latency, ensuring natural conversation flow during your meetings.
features.privacy.desc: End-to-end encryption and no data retention policies to keep your conversations secure and private.
features.transcripts.desc: Get multi-language transcripts of your meetings for sharing or future reference.
features.integration.desc: Seamlessly works with Zoom, Microsoft Teams, and Google Meet with a simple setup process.
features.analytics.desc: View insights on language usage, speaking time, and participation across your team's meetings.
features.how.desc: Our AI-powered solution translates speech in real-time, providing both audio output and subtitles for seamless multilingual communication.

features.step4: Hear translated audio and see real-time subtitles
